descriptionHtml:
Well i\'m guessing i\'m not the only one that has gotten bored and started jumping around town, Well some of you, like me, have managed to get on roofs, now i am making these roof-jumps rewarding. Use your jumping skills and Whirlwind Sprint to get up there, no cheats or mods required. This roof-quest thingy gives you a award and if you subscribe and keep an eye on the mod, you will see it updated with similiar things throughout Tamriel.

Current Cities with the quest:
All of them.

Patchlogs: http://pastebin.com/KpaVkpwe

You guys can still be featured in this mod!
Southswell was the first one to be featured, Aligarvazorith was the second one! But you can still have a chance to be featured! All you have to do is find and send in the code in the Winterhold treasure chest! Enjoy! 

Also if you are having problems finding the Morthal treasure chest, here is the location: http://gyazo.com/a1885c913670f772f9b35fddad9d62ec
author: Omgitburns
